metadata.name: Lemming
metadata.title_text: A Guided Disambiguation Tool for Plan Selection

secondary_links.name: Planning for Automated Composition of Aggregated Assistants
Explainable Composition of Aggregated Assistants
secondary_links.venue: ICAPS 2020 Workshop on Explainable AI Planning

secondary_links.name: A Unified Conversational Assistant Framework for Business Process Automation
secondary_links.venue: AAAI 2020 Workshop on Intelligent Process Automation

metadata.info_text: Lemming uses landmarks to guide a user to select a plan from a set of plans while minimizing for the number of disambiguation points. It also provides multiple views into the set of plans, reflecting different considerations for the user in terms of how much information they need to deal with during the disambgiuation process.
